name: Drift Cops
description:
Start your engine, push the throttle and drift on asphalt!
12 different countries:
-Romania
-Greece
-Finland
-Italy
-France
-Turkey
-Norway
-Spain
-Island
-Swiss
-Holland
-England

1 police car
Quality graphics
Best drift simulator on App Store!
Racing on high detailed tracks
Experience of real drift
Different camera angles
Original engine sounds
Nitrous system
Points grow proportionally to drift angle, drift time and speed
Depending on your score each stages, you can unlock new stages!
Get medals (Bronze, Silver, Gold) depending on your score


Have fun with Drift Cops!
